quote: Throughout this life, you can never be certain of living long enough to take another breath. – Huang Po
fact: During a severe windstorm or rainstorm the Empire State Building sways several feet to either side.
joke: What did celery say when he broke up with his girlfriend? She wasn't right for me, so I really don't carrot all.
